MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.00PM due to repairs required. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network on Blairlinn Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.06PM on 24 October 2020.
